projects.name: Electronic Permit to Work (e-PTW)
projects.description: A system for factories to manage and authorize contractor entry into premises. Project for a client thus the source code is confidential.

projects.name: Pokedex Website
projects.description: A simple Pokedex (an encyclopedia for the video game series Pokemon) to practice Vue router and fetching data from an open source RestfulAPI.

projects.name: Forecast Website
projects.description: A website to display weather and waves forecast for surfing. Freelance project developed for my client thus the source code is confidential.

projects.name: Http Listener & Process Monitor Script
projects.description: A lightweight script to listen to webhooks from an IoT network server and a monitoring script that sends email if the listener failed.

projects.name: NakFit
projects.description: A 2d motion-controlled video game with for Noizucon 2024 convention booth. Players physically squat to move the character using motion tracking.

projects.name: Blocks
projects.description: A 3d first-person video game with combination of action and puzzle elements. This project focuses on using Unreal Engine 5 and its physics engine.

projects.name: RPG Battle Systems Using Gyroscope
projects.description: A 3d action adventure mobile video game that implements gyroscope inputs from a smartphone device. My Degree's Final Year Project.
